com.smartcampus.android.ui.custom

Class TransparentPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • LinearLayout
      • com.smartcampus.android.ui.custom.TransparentPanel

  • public class TransparentPanel
extends LinearLayout
    The intention was that this class would be overlaid on MapView (cf com.smartcampus.android.ui.Map2D) However, the zoom button is placed on top of this panel resulting in an ugly appearance. Nice to have: Solve this problem.
